page.title: 03St. Arvans Village
page.content: The percentage of houses under 100 years old is 53%; 33% of houses are between 100 and 300 years old, and 7% are older than 300. 47% of the villagers have lived here since 1975, and 27% have lived here all there lives.Also 27% went to St.Arvans school. 94% of the the village said that the new estates have changed St.Arvans,and 60% liked the new estates. Only 13% thought any more should be built. 7% thought that the playing field spoilt the village. 63% thought that the school hadn't changed much in their life. The types of houses in the village are detached 50%,semi-detached 20%, terraced 16%,and bungalows 14%. By Nicola Milne, Marie Sadler and Sasha Bishop.
